ygData.subject: RE: You won't believe this crap
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Fiery Avenger is probably what Aradune was wielding. Which is not yet set to Paladin only. 2) The camping the binding point were NOT GM characters. They
ygData.messageBody:
1) Fiery Avenger is probably what Aradune was wielding. Which is not yet set
to Paladin only.

2) The "camping the binding point" were NOT GM characters. They were spawned
NPCs that stayed in one spot (The dark elves in Rivervale) I suspect the
same of those creatures that were "camping the zoning point" they were
pulled there by someone they were killing, and people kept coming through
oftne enough they never wandered back to their spawn point.

Not ALL of the NPCs in the War (in fact most of them weren't) were run by
player GM-types.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: John E. Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 10:19 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Cc: EQ_Cleric@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] You won't believe this crap
>
>
>I can't believe the screen shot I saw on www.eqvault.com it was a pic of
>Brad's character dead. It wasn't the being dead part I couldn't
>believe but
>what it was he had in his hand. Now remember his character is a
>Ranger, pic
>shows him wearing the new Ranger armor but in his hand was the SoulFire
>which is a Pally only weapon. Can we say cheating? Now if one of us tried
>that crap we'd get banned from the game but he can wield a Pally
>only weapon
>when he's a Ranger?
>That shows me the ppl like Brad and GM can get away with anything in the
>game. I also read on the EQ newsgroup that last Sunday the night of the
>events that the GM's were doing things that they've told players not to do
>and if they did they'd get banned for it. Heard they were camping at zone
>points waiting for a player to zone over and kill them and also camping
>binding points and killing someone over and over everytime he/she died and
>came back at their bind point till they got ticked and pulled the plug on
>their modems. If we would do that junk we'd get banned for it.
>Can't wait to hear what Brad has to say about him wielding a SoulFire.
>
>**************************
>Azor Spellbound
>Lvl 24 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>**************************
>
>>
